column1: I am booked to travel to Dubrovnik April 5. What is the situation in Dubrovnik for people coming from Germany.. are restaurants and hotels still open for business..
Plan on travelling by air from Hannover, Germany via Munich to Dubrovnik. Thanks for your reply

Check your country's advisories, but the UK government has advised:-"On 12 March the Croatian government announced that it will introduce with immediate effect a compulsory 14 day period of self-isolation for all foreign nationals arriving from the following destinations: the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Switzerland, Sweden, Italy, Spain, Austria, Netherlands, China, the Republic of Korea, Japan, and Singapore and Iran."https:/â€¦health
Appreciate your response and taking time to reply...
